quote: I dream of days like this...today, it became reality. UCI World Series win. Feeling good as hell!!!

Winning Gravel Swiss... my first UCI World series win!! I didn't expect to win a UCI race in my first year as a pro gravel racer, so when I caught the girl who was leading in the final 20km, I had so much motivation and adrenaline to absolutely empty myself all the way to the finish line, and ended ...

The final climb at Traka. It was really steep, and I'd made a move a few kilometres before to make my way into the top 10, and I really wanted to hold onto a top 10 finish so didn't want to be caught.
The race takes place at the doorsteps of the UCI headquarters in Aigle

Wild, demanding and infinitely alpine. From the World Cycling Center in Aigle to the heights of Villars, the Majestics Gravel crosses forests, ridges and high altitude paths, between silence and intensity.
